title: Rupert Grint and His Harry Potter Role
summary: Rupert Grint is an actor who played Ron Weasley in the Harry Potter movies. He says he will always be known for that role, even after many years. He is happy about it because it was a big part of his life and fans love it. Grint was 11 when he started acting as Ron, and it changed his life. He has done other acting jobs since then, but Ron is special to him. Recently, he wrote a letter to the new child actor playing Ron in a TV show. Grint thinks it's great that people still enjoy Harry Potter and feels proud of his work.

background_read: Harry Potter is a famous book and movie series about a young wizard named Harry and his friends at a magic school. Rupert Grint played Ron Weasley, one of Harry's best friends, in the movies. Many people grew up watching these films, and they are still popular today. Actors like Grint often become famous for such big roles, and it can be hard for them to be known for other things. But Grint is proud of his part in Harry Potter and enjoys meeting fans who loved the movies.
